domain.interfaces package

Submodules

domain.interfaces.AlgorithmConfigurator module

class domain.interfaces.AlgorithmConfigurator.AlgorithmConfigurator(data_file: str = 'multi-dataset.csv', model_name: str = 'model.pkl', report_file: str = 'report.csv', seed: int = 42)[source]

Bases: object

Configuration class for algorithm settings.

data_file

The name of the data file to be used (default is “multi-dataset.csv”).

Type:

str

model_name

The name of the model file to be used (default is “model.pkl”).

Type:

str

report_file

The name of the report file to be generated (default is “report.csv”).

Type:

str

seed

The seed value for random number generation (default is 42).

Type:

int

data_file: str = 'multi-dataset.csv'
model_name: str = 'model.pkl'
report_file: str = 'report.csv'
seed: int = 42

class domain.interfaces.AlgorithmEvaluate.AlgorithmEvaluate[source]

Bases: object

Abstract base class for algorithm evaluation.

evaluate(algorithm_data: AlgorithmConfigurator)[source]

Abstract method for evaluating the algorithm with the given configuration.

abstract evaluate(algorithm_data: AlgorithmConfigurator)[source]

Evaluates the algorithm with the given configuration.

Parameters:

algorithm_data (AlgorithmConfigurator) – The configuration data for the algorithm.

Raises:

NotImplementedError – If the method is not implemented in the derived class.
